title: Exact SU(2)*U(1) Stringy Black Holes
abstract: Extreme magnetic dilaton black holes are promoted to exact solutions of heterotic string theory with unbroken supersymmetry. With account taken of alpha' corrections this is accomplished by supplementing the known solutions with SU(2) Yang-Mills vectors and scalars in addition to the already existing Abelian U(1) vector field. The solution has a simple analytic form and includes multi-black-holes. The issue of exactness of other black-hole-type solutions, including extreme dilaton electrically charged black holes and Taub-NUT solutions is discussed.
